name: modern coat. MOVED TO USERSTYLES.WORLD
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
Use Userstyles.world for a version that is always up-to-date. I use stylus, which publishes there, unlike stylish.
additional_info:
Stylish is shit, use stylus. 
When using stylus, click the arrow up next to "find styles".
Click userstyles.world.

I keep my styles up-to-date whenever changes happen to the websites - but Stylish makes updating a pain, so rarely will I bother updating here.
